import React, {useState} from 'react' import styles from './modal-tweet.module.css' import Photo from '../photo' import IconButton from '../icon-button' import {Close} from '../icons' import ThemeButton from '../theme-button' var layout= [] function ModalTweet({onClick= () => {}}) { const [idea,setIdea]=useState('') const onSubmit= (e) => { e.preventDefault() layout.push(idea) localStorage.setItem('TEXT',JSON.stringify(layout),layout) onClick(false) } return (
